title: Kaitlyn Boehm Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Kaitlyn Boehm? Check out all of Kaitlyn Boehm's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogKaitlyn Boehm Client Services Analyst, Similarweb Kaitlyn Boehm Kaitlyn has been working in the paid search field since 2018 as a consultant and content writer. Since joining Similarweb, Kailtyn has been working with clients as a Client Services Analyst, training and assisting with sourcing insights using the platform to help further confirm the value the PRO can offer. She has a background in business management and a B.S. in Hospitality and Tourism from the University of Massachusetts Amherst. Besides residing deep in the world of paid search, Kaitlyn loves playing newly released video games, trying new recipes, and taking care of her multiple houseplants she has acquired over the past year!
